content: Please help me in welcoming the participants in a FHIR Training Course in Tallinn (Estonia) to the FHIR community. They have a HL7v3 based message exchange for medical records (CDA), persons and organisations, and are looking to see how FHIR could be used in such a context. They'll also be defining Estonian profiles. Welcome to the community!
Hi to everyone in Estonia, and welcome!
Welcome to the FHIR world! Enjoy your journey!
The health IT world is well aware of Estonia's leadership in digital health - glad to have you join us here!
Tallinn is just amazing. Glad to have them join us!
Hello from Estonia! It`s nice to see this warm welcome here! Thank you!

Thanks all for your welcoming words.
We had a full room of attendees at the FHIR training course, a strategic decision has been taken to embrace FHIR - but it has to be seen how/where it is going to be used. I've invited the team to show up at one of the coming (European) DevDays to share their experiences, we all learn by sharing :-)
